entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-05-25
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Using PersistedAssemblyBuilder, TypeBuilder.DefineMethodOverride() throws NotSupportedException #102694
  • Unable to use HttpClient configured with UseDefaultCredentials true when the process is running under a restricted token with restricted SIDs #102692
  • `LibraryImport` do not copy `this` #102690
  • PersistedAssemblyBuilder writes corrupt metadata tokens to IL stream for arrays of newly-declared types #102687
  • .dbg in ilcompiler package #102684
  • [API Proposal]: New overloads for named wait handles that enable creating/opening user-specific synchronization primitives #102682
    9.0.0

Closed

  • CoreCLR doesn't boot on a "modern" Linux/ARM image #10728
  • Reduce potential false sharing for static fields (sync objects) #102675

PullRequests

Created

  • Fix WhiteSpace validation in HttpHeaders #102693
    area-System.Net.Http, 9.0.0
  • Http2Connection throws misleading exceptions on ping timeouts #102691
    area-System.Net.Http, community-contribution, 9.0.0
  • Correct NullabilityInfo for indexer parameters in certain circumstances #102686
    area-System.Reflection, community-contribution
  • Implement `Console.Beep` via bell character instead of Windows API #102685
    area-System.Console, breaking-change, needs-breaking-change-doc-created, community-contribution
  • Use generic math for floating point formatting #102683
    area-System.Numerics, community-contribution
  • [release/8.0-staging] Backport 1ES templates #102681
    area-Infrastructure
  • [NativeAOT] Adding CET support #102680
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr

Merged

  • Avoid clearing thread local handles for already unloaded loader #99998
    blocked, area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution

Updated

  • CI Test #100951
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW
  • Add ActivitySource Tags #102678
    new-api-needs-documentation, area-System.Diagnostics.Activity, 9.0.0
  • 2nd call to MemoryCache.Set() with the same key same size erases entry if cache is full #102420
    area-Extensions-Caching, community-contribution
  • Make normal statics simpler #99183
    NO-MERGE, area-VM-coreclr
  • Add support for Sve.StoreNarrowing() #102605
    area-System.Runtime.Intrinsics, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution, arm-sve
  • Seal overridden virtual method `SetDefaultFallbacks` #100030
    area-System.Text.Encoding, community-contribution
  • Cleanup VARIANT marshalling and convert to managed #102498
    area-Interop-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Convert our CryptoKit bindings to use Swift structs at the boundary #102583
    area-System.Security, 9.0.0
  • Fix 2 issues when triggering a garbage collection via EventPipe #102612
    area-Tracing-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Use PayloadReader in System.Resources.Extensions #102379
    area-System.Resources, breaking-change, needs-breaking-change-doc-created, 9.0.0
  • Content-Length header not always returned when enumerating HttpContentHeaders #102416
    area-System.Net.Http, community-contribution, 9.0.0
  • Switch DirectoryControl to use AsnWriter, AsnDecoder #101512
    area-System.DirectoryServices, community-contribution
  • CI test #99871
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [release/8.0-staging] Fix calculation of channel bindings hash in managed NTLM implementation #102565
    os-android, community-contribution, 8.0.x
  • Update SDK to 9.0 preview 4 #102604
    area-Infrastructure, community-contribution
  • Add randomized allocation sampling #100356
    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution
  • SVE: Added `Load2xVectorAndUnzip`, `Load3xVectorAndUnzip`, `Load4xVectorAndUnzip` APIs #102180
    area-System.Runtime.Intrinsics, new-api-needs-documentation, arm-sve
  • Add Base64url encoding/decoding #102364
    area-System.Memory, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Periodically flush when using PipeWriter in Json #102541
    area-System.Text.Json
